divs: sighting detailswe were at a barbeque and were talking. i looked up in the sky and saw two orange lights just hovering. i was like what the f*** they were flickering from orange to white. then one took off in a split second to the left of me and re appeared on the right and was moving slowly. then hovered again. i have video of it! here is the link to the video. i dont have it on my computer to upload.
